thread.title: Watch: Yoo Ah In Demonstrates His Passionate Acting Even During Table Read For “Chicago Typewriter”
thread.title_full: Watch: Yoo Ah In Demonstrates His Passionate Acting Even During Table Read For “Chicago Typewriter”

author: christinaoh21
title: Watch: Yoo Ah In Demonstrates His Passionate Acting Even During Table Read For “Chicago Typewriter”
text:
Shares 760 Display.Sharethrough.Soompi.1x1 
On March 23, tvN released a new video on tvN Drama’s official YouTube channel of the table read for their upcoming fantasy drama “Chicago Typewriter.” 
In the video, viewers can see the main cast – which includes Yoo Ah In , Im Soo Jung , and Go Kyung Pyo – all together for the first time. Despite it being a table read, Yoo Ah In passionately read his lines and had to stop himself at times from going overboard, which garnered laughs from those at the table read. Soompi.Display.News.English.300x250.BTF Soompi.Mobile.English.300x250.ATF 
“Chicago Typewriter” was written by writer Jin Soo Won, who has written popular dramas like “ Kill Me, Heal Me ” and “ Moon Embracing the Sun .” The drama will be directed by Kim Chul Kyu, who has previously directed dramas like “ Emergency Couple ” and “ Hwang Jin Yi .” 
Meanwhile, it was confirmed earlier today that actor Kwak Si Yang would be joining the cast as a jealous rival character opposite of Yoo Ah In. 
tvN’s Friday-Saturday drama “Chicago Typewriter” is set to air on April 7 at 8 p.m. KST. 
Watch the table read video below!
